## Integration Flow

```
Developer/Content Creator
         â”‚
         â”œâ”€> Creates Issue (Stage Gate Review)
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â”œâ”€> Apply stage label
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â–¼
         â”‚   Auto-linker workflow
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â”œâ”€> Add to GitHub Project
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â–¼
         â”‚   Project Board (appropriate column)
         â”‚
         â”œâ”€> Creates Draft PR
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â”œâ”€> PR template auto-fills
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â–¼
         â”‚   CODEOWNERS trigger
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â”œâ”€> Request Executive Producer review
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â–¼
         â”‚   Review & Approval
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â”œâ”€> Approved? Merge
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â”œâ”€> Rejected? Request changes
         â”‚         â”‚
         â”‚         â–¼
         â”‚   Next stage or iteration
         â”‚
         â””â”€> Content Update Alert (as needed)
                   â”‚
                   â”œâ”€> Flag outdated content
                   â”‚
                   â–¼
             Review and update cycle
```

## Key Benefits

1. **Automated Tracking**: Items automatically added to project board
2. **Consistent Process**: Templates ensure all required info is captured
3. **Required Reviews**: CODEOWNERS ensures proper oversight
4. **Clear Stage Gates**: Visual progress through development stages
5. **Evidence-Based**: Templates enforce citation and rationale requirements
6. **Freshness Management**: Content update alerts track SLA breaches
